type WebServiceAdapterObject = interface interface WebServiceAdapter2 interface WebServiceAdapter

Docs.summary: Represents a connection to an XML Web service.

remarks.para: This type is a wrapper for a coclass that is required by managed code for COM interoperability. Use this type to access the members of the COM interface implemented by this coclass. For information about the COM interface, including a link to descriptions of its members, see.
The WebServiceAdapterObject object is a type of Microsoft InfoPath data adapter that contains all the information necessary for retrieving data from and submitting data to an external data source.

The WebServiceAdapterObject provides properties that can be used to get and set information about the data adapter's input and operation strings. It also provides a property for getting the Uniform Resource Locator (URL) of the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file of the XML Web service.

For secondary data sources, the WebServiceAdapterObject object is accessible through the property of the object and the property of the . Data objects are accessible through the property of the object.
If a Web service is used as the primary data source for a form, the WebServiceAdapterObject object is accessible through property of the object
